I think the string has something to do with them talking, so I'll try to draw a line between them, but I'm not sure what else to do with it. I might make the line wavy because it looks interesting. Prompt: A colorful drawing of two stick figure students facing each other. There is a wavy line between them that does not connect to any objects. The background is simple with no specific details about the setting. The drawing style is basic and childlike, with minimal details.
Explaination: The image prompt reflects the student's ability to draw two students, showing an attempt to create communication partners. The absence of cups or cans, as well as the lack of labels or notes, indicates the student's misunderstanding of constructing and labeling a string telephone.
